comments:
I'm seeing the stack trace below during call to
VirtualComponent.getReferencingComponents() (for the VirtualComponent for a
project on receipt of a PRE_DELETE event for the project; I'm using a head
version of the wst.common.modulecore plugin from 11/9)

Looking at the code, the call to getPrimaryResource() can return null, however,
"isLoaded()" is being called without a null check; I think a simple null check i
that line should be sufficient to fix (it eliminates the NPE for me, however, a
null returned at that point may indicate other issues)

I had found it w/ version 1.13 of ModuleStructuralModel - looks like the NPE is
still a potential issue w/ 1.14 but have not repro'd w/ that yet...
This is fixed for the 1111 WTP M9 integration driver.
